summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 5th Avenue Northeast, from East 85th Street to East 92nd Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13689 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
